title: Is it safe to order books online right now that the Covid-19 outbreak is at large? - Quora

response.answer_text: Right now most e-commerce companies are supplying only essential needs for survive in this lock down period. so mostly they will not except your order. But if you still want to read books than i suggest you to join Amazon kindle unlimited for free one month trial and after a month you can close it. There you will get some good books free and for some popular book you have to pay very less money mostly below 100.

because of lock down no e commerce websites are delivering items other than essentials such as food items so even if you order they wont deliver it now also even if they are delivering it cant be told whether it has corona infectants or not because the package is sealed and packed by the seller
